elementMetadata.description: Add a Sage Financials Instance to connect your existing Sage account to the Sage Accounting Hub, allowing you to manage customers, journals, ledger accounts, etc. across multiple Sage Elements. You will need your Sage Financials account information to add an instance.
elementMetadata.name: Sage Financials

configuration.description: The OAuth API Key (The Client ID or Consumer Key in Salesforce.com)
configuration.name: OAuth API Key

configuration.description: Sage Financials OAuth Token Refresh URL
configuration.name: OAuth Token Refresh URL

configuration.description: Enables use of global fields query parameter to filter response to only specified fields. This will override any existing vendor functionality on the connector
configuration.name: Allow Select Fields parameter

configuration.description: Sage Live Beta Max Page Size (or limit)
configuration.name: Max Page Size (or limit)

configuration.description: Sage Live Beta OAuth basic header
configuration.name: OAuth basic header

configuration.description: Sage Live Beta OAuth Refresh Interval (s)
configuration.name: OAuth Refresh Interval (s)

configuration.description: SFDC API Key. This can be found by going to the Remote Access section on Salesforce.com
configuration.name: API Key

configuration.description: Sage Financials OAuth Token Revoke URL
configuration.name: OAuth Token Revoke URL

configuration.description: SFDC API Secret. This can be found by going to the Remote Access section on Salesforce.com
configuration.name: API Secret

configuration.description: The OAuth API Secret (The Client Secret or Consumer Secret in Salesforce.com)
configuration.name: OAuth API Secret

configuration.description: Salesforce.com Endpoint Address (environment). If you're unsure, the default should be fine.
configuration.name: Endpoint Address

configuration.description: Use https://test.salesforce.com/services/oauth2/token for the SFDC sandbox environment
configuration.name: Login/Token URL

configuration.description: The security token can be found by going to the Settings section for the user.
configuration.name: Security Token

configuration.description: Use https://test.salesforce.com/services/oauth2/revoke for the SFDC sandbox environment
configuration.name: Revoke URL

configuration.description: The subscription ID for the webhook events subscription
configuration.name: Event Notification Subscription ID

configuration.description: Sage Financials Event Notification Signature Key
configuration.name: Event Notification Signature Key

configuration.description: Used For Retrieving User Profile Information Auto Set.
configuration.name: Profile Url

configuration.description: Used to enable/disable filtering of null values from the responses.
configuration.name: Filter null values from the response

configuration.description: Generic map used to specify default fields for bulk download and GET /all requests. Each key should be the canonical objectName and values may be specified as a comma-delimited string or a list of strings
configuration.name: Default select fields

configuration.description: Used for how often to poll the application (in minutes)
configuration.name: Event poller refresh interval

configuration.description: An application callback URL used for event notifications from SFDC and Cloud Elements
configuration.name: Event Notification Callback URL

configuration.description: Event Poller Resources Configuration. The configuration is defined via JSON, an example of which is as follows - { "contacts": { "url": "/hubs/helpdesk/contacts", “idField”: “user.id”, “datesConfiguration”: { "updatedDateField": "user.updated_at", "updatedDateFormat": "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssX", “createdDateField”: “user.created_at”, “createdDateFormat": "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssX" }, "pageSize": 10000 } }
configuration.name: Event Poller Resources Configuration

description: Add a Sage Financials Instance to connect your existing Sage account to the Sage Accounting Hub, allowing you to manage customers, journals, ledger accounts, etc. across multiple Sage Elements. You will need your Sage Financials account information to add an instance.

resources.description: Retrieve balances for a ledger account

parameters.name: where

parameters.description: The number of resources to return in a given page
parameters.name: pageSize

parameters.description: The page number of resources to retrieve
parameters.name: page
